snippet: The new chief, the third in JetBlue’s 14-year history, will be Robin Hayes, 48, a former British Airways executive.
abstract: Dave Barger will step down as chief executive of JetBlue Airways, and his successor will be president Robin Hayes, ending months of speculation about airline's leadership.
lead_paragraph: The new chief, the third in JetBlue’s 14-year history, will be Robin Hayes, 48, a former British Airways executive.

headline.main: JetBlue Names New Chief After Months of Speculation
headline.print_headline: JetBlue Names New Chief After Months of Speculation
